questions.question: What is the predominant color of the product's outer surface, as shown in the image?
What is the overall shape of the product container, ignoring any minor irregularities?
Considering the image, what appears to be the primary material of the product's container?
Based on the image, what is the texture of the product's surface—smooth, rough, or something else?
What is the visible design element on the bottom surface of the product, excluding text?
Judging by the visual clarity, what appears to be the level of sheen or gloss on the product's exterior?
Is there any visible pattern or texture discernible on the product's main surface area?
What color is the text and safety warnings printed on the product's base?
Considering the packaging, what kind of product is suggested by the shape and labeling?
Does the image show any obvious imperfections or damage to the product's container?
What is the general form factor of the item, e.g., cylindrical, spherical, etc.?
What kind of graphic or symbol is present near the warning text on the base?
Does the image show any significant markings other than text and symbols?
Based on the visual appearance, is the product's container transparent or opaque?
What is the color family of the dominant shade of the item?
